00008 void Render::initialiseRender(EnvironmentAndRigidBody* _environment)
00009 {
00010 
00011     m_bbox = new ngl::BBox(_environment->getBBox()->center(),_environment->getBBox()->width(),_environment->getBBox()->height(),_environment->getBBox()->depth());
00012     ngl::VBOPrimitives *prim =  ngl::VBOPrimitives::instance();
00013     prim->createVBOSphere("particle",1,32);
00014 
00015     ngl::ShaderManager *shader=ngl::ShaderManager::instance();
00016 
00017     shader->createShaderProgram("3DShading");
00018 
00019     shader->attachShader("3DShadingVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00020     shader->attachShader("3DShadingFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00021     shader->loadShaderSource("3DShadingVertex","shaders/Basic.vs");
00022     shader->loadShaderSource("3DShadingFragment","shaders/Basic.fs");
00023 
00024     shader->compileShader("3DShadingVertex");
00025     shader->compileShader("3DShadingFragment");
00026     shader->attachShaderToProgram("3DShading","3DShadingVertex");
00027     shader->attachShaderToProgram("3DShading","3DShadingFragment");
00028     shader->bindAttribute( "3DShading", 0, "inVertex");
00029     shader->bindAttribute( "3DShading", 1, "perVColor");
00030     shader->linkProgramObject("3DShading");
00031     shader->use("3DShading");
00032 
00033     shader->createShaderProgram("ConstantShading");
00034 
00035     shader->attachShader("ConstantShadingVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00036     shader->attachShader("ConstantShadingFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00037     shader->loadShaderSource("ConstantShadingVertex","shaders/Colour.vs");
00038     shader->loadShaderSource("ConstantShadingFragment","shaders/Colour.fs");
00039 
00040     shader->compileShader("ConstantShadingVertex");
00041     shader->compileShader("ConstantShadingFragment");
00042     shader->attachShaderToProgram("ConstantShading","ConstantShadingVertex");
00043     shader->attachShaderToProgram("ConstantShading","ConstantShadingFragment");
00044     shader->bindAttribute( "ConstantShading", 0, "inVertex");
00045     shader->bindAttribute( "ConstantShading", 1, "perVColor");
00046     shader->linkProgramObject("ConstantShading");
00047     shader->use("ConstantShading");
00048 }

00050 void Render::draw(EnvironmentAndRigidBody *_environment, SPHSolver *_solver,ngl::TransformStack _transformStack, ngl::Camera* _cam)
00051 {
00052 //    std::cout << "Enters the Render" << std::endl;
00053     std::string _shadername;
00054     std::vector<FluidParticle> _fluidParticleList;
00055     std::vector<Particle> _rbdSphereList;
00056     ngl::VBOPrimitives* prim = ngl::VBOPrimitives::instance();
00057 
00058     ngl::ShaderManager *shader=ngl::ShaderManager::instance();
00059 
00060     /*--- Drawing the Boundary Box -----------*/
00061     (*shader)["ConstantShading"]->use();
00062     shader->setShaderParam4f("ConstantShading", "inColor", _environment->getBoundaryColour().m_r, _environment->getBoundaryColour().m_g, _environment->getBoundaryColour().m_b ,1);
00063     shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix("ConstantShading","ViewMatrix",_cam->getModelView());
00064     _transformStack.loadGlobalAndCurrentMatrixToShader("ConstantShading","ModelMatrix");
00065             m_bbox->draw();
00066 
00067 
00068     _fluidParticleList = _solver->getFluidParticleList();
00069     _rbdSphereList = _environment->getRBDSphereList();
00070 
00071     /*---Checking if the user wants to visualize the fluid particles------*/
00072     if (_solver->getDrawFluidParticles())
00073     {
00074         if (_solver->getVisualizationType() == "3DShading")
00075         {
00076             (*shader)["3DShading"]->use();
00077             _shadername = "3DShading";
00078             shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix(_shadername,"ViewMatrix",_cam->getModelView());
00079         }
00080         if (_solver->getVisualizationType() == "ConstantShading")
00081         {
00082              (*shader)["ConstantShading"]->use();
00083             _shadername = "ConstantShading";
00084             shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix(_shadername,"ViewMatrix",_cam->getModelView());
00085         }
00086 
00087         /*--- Drawing the fluid particles--------*/
00088         _transformStack.pushTransform();
00089         {
00090             for (int i = 0;i<_fluidParticleList.size();++i)
00091             {
00092                 ngl::Vector _position = _fluidParticleList[i].getCurrentPosition();
00093                 ngl::Real _scale = _fluidParticleList[i].getDrawRadius();
00094                 ngl::Colour _colour = _fluidParticleList[i].getParticleColour();
00095                 _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setPosition(_position);
00096                 _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setScale(_scale,_scale,_scale);
00097                 shader->setShaderParam4f(_shadername, "inColor", _colour.m_r,_colour.m_g,_colour.m_b,1.0);
00098                 shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix(_shadername,"ModelMatrix", _transformStack.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix());
00099                 prim->draw("particle");
00100             }
00101 
00102         }
00103         _transformStack.popTransform();
00104     }
00105     /*---Checking are obstacles enabled or not------*/
00106     if (_environment->getObstacleEnabled())
00107     {
00108 
00109     (*shader)["3DShading"]->use();
00110     shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix("3DShading","ViewMatrix",_cam->getModelView());
00111 
00112         /*--- Drawing the RBD spheres------*/
00113         _transformStack.pushTransform();
00114         {
00115             for (int i = 0;i<_rbdSphereList.size();++i)
00116             {
00117                 ngl::Vector _position = _rbdSphereList[i].getCurrentPosition();
00118                 ngl::Real _scale = _rbdSphereList[i].getDrawRadius();
00119                 ngl::Colour _colour = _rbdSphereList[i].getParticleColour();
00120                 _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setPosition(_position);
00121                 _transformStack.getCurrentTransform().setScale(_scale,_scale,_scale);
00122                 shader->setShaderParam4f("3DShading", "inColor", _colour.m_r,_colour.m_g,_colour.m_b,1.0);
00123                 shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix("3DShading","ModelMatrix", _transformStack.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix());
00124                 prim->draw("particle");
00125             }
00126         }
00127         _transformStack.popTransform();
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 void Render::updateProjection(ngl::Camera *_cam)
00132 {
00133     ngl::ShaderManager *shader=ngl::ShaderManager::instance();
00134     (*shader)["3DShading"]->use();
00135           shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix("3DShading","projectionMatrix",_cam->getProjection());
00136     (*shader)["ConstantShading"]->use();
00137           shader->setShaderParamFromMatrix("ConstantShading","projectionMatrix",_cam->getProjection());
00138 }
